project.description:
Title: Scrum 3 Multiple Component, Deployment job

Description: This job will deploy all selected components to Scrum 3. User specifies :
  • The components to deploy
  • Whether to rebuild any database components or only run the liquibase update against existing database
The version used will be derivevd from the version currently deployed to the DevInt system.

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: DeployUser
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: Enter the User id and summary of purpose for deployment

com.cwctravel.hudson.plugins.extended__c.name: Components
com.cwctravel.hudson.plugins.extended__c.value: ads-core, Dynamic-Ad-Insertion-engine, dai-national-cis, ad-load-manager, dai-cip-feedback, caas-core, metadata-publisher, dai-cip, dai-etl-feeder, dai-smsi, int-test-support, dmp-config, smsi-publisher, smsiCorrection, dai-smsi-relay, smsi-msp-relay, dai_amm_publisher, dai-metadata-ingestion, dai-dce, Dynamic-Ad-Insertion-cm, acp, POIS, dai-lincoln, ops-dce-metadata-agent, Pgmr-Cpgn-Int, MicroDev, impression_collector, request-mgr, SDC-session-collector, smsi-msp-relay

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: DB_Rebuild
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: If there is a DB associated with these components, do you want to rebuild ALL schemas from scratch or perform just a liquibase update against ALL existing schemas?

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh echo "--- Deployment ID: ${BUILD_TAG} - ${BUILD_ID}
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "System Delivery to ${DeployTarg} by ${DeployUser}
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log export SelComp=$(echo "$Components" | sed 's/,/ /g' ) for Component in $SelComp do # Set getVer to 0 to default to devint version # export getVer="0" export BUILD_TAG export DeployUser export Component export Clear_Logs="No" export Version export VERSION=${Version} export DeployTarg="scrum3" cd /opt/build/scripts ./Single_Component_Deploy.sh $Component $DB_Rebuild $Clear_Logs $DeployTarg $BUILD_TAG $DeployUser done
